item.description:
AI Pioneer YouTube Channels - RSS Feed Sources

This combined feed aggregates content from the following channels:

  • Two Minute Papers (@TwoMinutePapers) - 1.66M subs - Research paper summaries
  • Krish Naik (@krishnaik06) - 1.25M subs - ML/Data Science tutorials
  • Matt Wolfe (@mreflow) - 785K subs - AI tools & FutureTools.io
  • DeepLearning.AI (@Deeplearningai) - 429K subs - Andrew Ng's educational content
  • Sentdex (@sentdex) - 273K subs - Python ML programming
  • MattVidPro AI (@MattVidPro) - 245K subs - AI video production
  • Andrej Karpathy (@karpathy) - 220K subs - Deep learning expert tutorials

Individual RSS Feeds:

  • Two Minute Papers RSS
  • Krish Naik RSS
  • Matt Wolfe RSS
  • DeepLearning.AI RSS
  • Sentdex RSS
  • MattVidPro AI RSS
  • Andrej Karpathy RSS

Content Categories:

  • Research Analysis: Two Minute Papers
  • Education/Tutorials: Krish Naik, DeepLearning.AI
  • AI Tools: Matt Wolfe
  • Programming: Sentdex
  • Video Production: MattVidPro AI
  • Deep Learning: Andrej Karpathy

Generated on: 2025-01-27

Status: All channels marked as PENDING_EVALUATION for operator review

item.title: ðŸ”§ RSS Feed Aggregation Instructions
item.description:
How to Use These RSS Feeds

For RSS Readers:

  1. Add each individual channel RSS URL to your RSS reader
  2. Create folders/categories by content type
  3. Set refresh intervals to 30-60 minutes for optimal performance

For Automated Systems:

Use the JSON data file for programmatic access:


{
  "channels": [
    {
      "name": "Two Minute Papers",
      "rss_feed_url": "https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=UCbfYPyITQ-7l4upoX8nvctg",
      "category": "research_analysis",
      "status": "PENDING_EVALUATION"
    }
    // ... more channels
  ]
}

Evaluation Workflow:

  1. PENDING_EVALUATION: Operator reviews channel quality and recent content
  2. TRYOUT: Content flows to "tryout" feed stream for evaluation
  3. CANDIDATE: Content flows to "candidate" stream with entity analysis
  4. LIVE: Full integration into main feed

Next Steps:

  • Review each channel's recent content quality
  • Assess alignment with AI pioneer criteria
  • Move promising channels to TRYOUT phase
  • Set up automated content evaluation pipeline
